# Roman Built Construction
# https://romanbuiltconstruction.com
# LLM Context File

## Business Overview
Roman Built Construction is a licensed general contractor serving San Diego County, California. Founded by Saud Carrillo, we specialize in residential and commercial construction projects of all sizes.

## Contact Information
- Business Name: Roman Built Construction
- Owner: Saud Carrillo
- Phone: (760) 504-3349
- Email: info@romanbuiltconstruction.com
- Location: San Diego, California
- License: California Contractors State License Board (CSLB)

## Services Offered
1. Kitchen Remodeling - Complete kitchen renovations, cabinet installation, countertops, appliances
2. Bathroom Remodeling - Master baths, guest baths, shower conversions, tile work
3. Room Additions - Bedroom additions, ADU construction, second stories, in-law suites
4. Home Renovations - Whole house remodels, interior renovations, structural modifications
5. Commercial Construction - Tenant improvements, office build-outs, retail, restaurants
6. Custom Home Building - Design-build services, ground-up construction
7. Exterior Construction - Patios, decks, outdoor kitchens, pergolas, hardscaping
8. Structural Repairs - Foundation repair, earthquake retrofitting, load-bearing modifications
9. Roofing Services - Roof replacement, repair, new construction roofing
10. Concrete & Masonry - Foundations, driveways, decorative concrete, stonework

## Service Areas
We serve all of San Diego County including:
- San Diego
- Chula Vista
- Oceanside
- Escondido
- Carlsbad
- El Cajon
- Vista
- San Marcos
- Encinitas
- National City
- La Mesa
- Santee
- Poway
- La Jolla
- Del Mar
- Coronado
- Imperial Beach
- Pacific Beach
- Mission Beach
- Point Loma
- Rancho Bernardo
- Scripps Ranch
- Mira Mesa
- Clairemont
- Kearny Mesa

## Key Differentiators
- Licensed, bonded, and fully insured
- 10+ years of construction experience
- Transparent pricing with detailed estimates
- Dedicated project management
- Quality materials from trusted suppliers
- Comprehensive warranties on workmanship
- Clean, respectful work environment
- On-time project completion commitment

## Pricing Information
- Kitchen remodels: $25,000 - $100,000+
- Bathroom remodels: $15,000 - $60,000+
- Room additions: $300-$500 per square foot
- ADUs: $150,000 - $300,000+
- Custom homes: $350-$600+ per square foot

## Business Hours
- Monday - Friday: 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
- Sunday: Closed

## How to Get Started
1. Contact us for a free consultation
2. We'll discuss your project and provide an estimate
3. Sign the contract and we'll schedule your project
4. Construction begins with regular progress updates
5. Final walkthrough ensures your satisfaction
